attributes.action: table a bill to allow for the direct election of future Prime Ministers, and require Boris Johnson to stand.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Boris Johnson is brilliant and totally different politician, unlike the others from all parties who it seems will make any statement or offer any cheap promise if they think it will secure them a few votes. Which other politician would chase away muggers while calling them oiks?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
